name: Impostor Tiles
description:
Impostor Tiles

Just a game I made in a little under 4 hours as part of a friendly competition between myself and a fellow programmer. The theme was 'Discovery' and the limitation was that we could only use shades of black and white as well as one other colour of our choice.

Instructions-

Walk around the board in search of impostor tiles. As you get closer to an impostor tile, the board will darken and the music will slow. When the tiles are at their darkest and the music its slowest, you're stood on an impostor. Click on it to reveal it. Be warned, you have only one life and one wrong move is game over.

Controls-

  • -WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • -Shift to sprint
  • -Left click to select tiles

Hope you enjoy!
